Questions about the monster book...
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher DS Archive (DS): Japanese DS Games Archive: Monster Farm DS: Misc. Q&A (post all new topics here, we'll make more sections later): Questions about the monster book...
By NintendoFanBoy on Monday, December 31, 2007 - 01:18 pm:

Is there a way to find out what you did to regenerate a monster?

In other words, if I have a monster that I have used a drawing to obtain, and have forgotten the drawing I used, is there a way to find the drawing used?

Also, if I have a monster in the book, and I get that same monster again, is there a way to replace the first monster's stats with the second? You know... the way they do it in MRA2.

By GM on Monday, December 31, 2007 - 01:24 pm:

Sorry, but the book doesn't record the method you used to regenerate the monster.

Also, when a monster is added to the book, regardless of its stats at birth, the monster's base stat levels are recorded.

By NintendoFanBoy on Monday, December 31, 2007 - 01:27 pm:

ah... okay thats good to know. now i wont be trying to do that anymore
